website_summaries.verdict: Operates smoothly and a great fit for kids and adults who consume media on a regular basis.
pros: Comes with an attachable keyboard and large display screen for a mini laptop
Adaptive and can charge with multiple devices
Customers report the laptop streams  favorite channels with little buffering
cons: We wish the battery life would last more than 7 hours

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this sturdy,quality tablet/Pc.
customer_reviews.text: aWESOME,STURDY,UNIQUE ANDROID TABLET/PC.And the price is AWESOME for the quality that you get! The pictures dont serve justice just to as sturdy,and qulity this product is...Fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product at awesome price! A++
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our children to use for homework. It has been great. Works for everything they have needed it for. They have also enjoyed watching movies on it. Only downside is you have to use Google Docs with it, but once you get familiar with that program, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this tablet as new. It is however ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tablet as new. It is however used. There are signs of use , it has an email address configured and is asking for a password of which have no clue. I did a factory reset, now it is asking for an email address that was previously used to sync the device. This is unusable to me.
customer_reviews.author: IVOR DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Spend you money on something better
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this it’s cheap for a reason. It doesn’t stay connected to the internet constantly disconnecting and reconnecting. Every time you turn it on it updates chrome and youtube. You can never connect to the store it always says no connection available even though it’s connected to the internet. All the other devices in my house have no problem with my internet connection so why does it? The only thing this thing is good for is watching videos providing it stays connected to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: veronica l hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the money..few issues.
customer_reviews.text: Had issues after just two weeks of use. When the screen is in the vericle position...if you move it at all, the screen goes dark for about 15 seconds. Not sure why it's doing this. Doesn't do it in horizontal position. This is my 2nd RCA...first one was Rca Maven Pro..had major issues after just 2 years. I know these are probably cheaply made, hence the low price, but I can't afford the more expensive ones. So far, other than the issue I mentioned...no problems !
customer_reviews.author: Martha R. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. The quality was so cheaply made and the touch screen does not responses quickly enough--sometimes just not responding. The language input is not working correctly and sometimes come out with the wrong letter when you type. I did not expect RCA to make such a product. I felt very very disappointed. RCA should not have sold this item to completely destroy their reputations.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Nagamura

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice and just the right size for my needs, easy to operate, touch screen and user friendly. This trumps my PC and my Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Woods

customer_reviews.title: crashes often and hates connecting to my wifi
customer_reviews.text: kinda hate this thing. hates my internet wifi. crashes often. runs very slow. worse than my phone, 3 other tablets, a laptop the TV's (youtube), and two pcs. all run wifi. 7 months after purchased. it's even worse. it takes forever to load a site. jumps around on a page, then android stop message pops up.. I started writing this on it, the keyboard lagged so far behind me typing I gave up. it's terrible awful bad. I'm on amazon looking a different one now. its cheap $ a horrible buy. hate it... my roomie is laughing at me.
customer_reviews.author: hauntman

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea behind this product, the execution of it not so much. All the trouble started after i first turned it on, it froze and stayed frozen until i shut the device down 3 times in a row. After I got the wifi hooked up 3 of the default apps that come on the device get stuck in an endless update cycle. The default photos application will open and crash 2-3 seconds after you open it. Even when not in use the photos message will pop up and say it is not usable, and asks do you want to report it. Also and this is the main reason it gets one star, it is VERY VERY VERY SLOW!
customer_reviews.author: GOHARD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our kids to finish out the school year. They turned out to be more of a headache and were unusable. The programs we needed to finish up the school year were not compatible with the version of browser this unit supports. The screen does not rotate orientation from vertical to horizontal on all sites so when it converts back to vertical it is totally worthless having to try to rotate the whole unit to search then rotate back to horizontal to use, it is cheaply made and designed and basically a worthless electronic. I do not recommend these for anyones children, invest in a small laptop instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and it’s absolutely AWFUL!!!!! The worst!!!! He hardly used it bc its THAT bad! I returned it... you can’t see anything on the screen no matter how much you adjust the brightness... it is BEYOND slow!!!! The quality of the videos you watch are so bad too! Just save your money and buy an iPad, or some other legit brand tablet... that’s what I’m doing... I was really disappointed bc I bought this as an xmas gift for my son bc he wanted a laptop/tablet sooooo bad! IF I COULD GIVE THIS NEGATIVE STARS I WOULD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 2 in 1!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great!! I love it I've had a different one before that was an inch smaller or so (10.1) and let me tell you this 11.5 inch screen makes a BIG difference! Performance is great and the keyboard is awesome as well! I just got it but I love it already and I have downloaded a lot of app's I need on it that I have on my phone, and I still have a lot of space left I only used 32% I thought it would of been at least 50% or more haha! Great tablet thanks RCA and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tablet. In just a few days it has become my to-go tool for almost everything I do: daily planning, finances, email, browsing the web. It is fast, easy to set-up and use, and an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is okay at best.
customer_reviews.text: I kind of had high hopes for this product, but unfortunately it did not preform to well. Its really just an "okay" tablet that someone with small kids should definitely look.... especially for the price. The camera capabilities just suck for a tablet this size, the battery life says it last a good 6 hrs while in use... i got about 5 out of it, It is an android product. Thats really all I got out of it. Im not going to say this is a terrible product as like I said.. if you want to keep the kids busy... yeah.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this based on reviews, but I cannot understand what kind of people would be satisfied enough to give it a 5 star review. The performance of this machine is so slow that it is virtually useless for even basic web surfing. It takes forever to navigate and looks like it has mind of its own, thinking as if whether to execute the command or not. What a waste of design! Finally, I just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months of really light use
customer_reviews.text: Power button went out about two months after I bought it. The only cool thing is that Amazon still credited me a gift card for what I paid for it out of good faith which is awesome. I really wouldn't buy it. I have a small rca tablet that tho is a little slow plays videos great and good for email etc. I've had it for 2 years and it's a beast. I think it's just this particular model. RCA doesn't really exist anymore except for having companies rights to use their name on their product. Avoid this one.
customer_reviews.author: austinguy

customer_reviews.title: Great for browsing online
customer_reviews.text: Great for browsing online, playing games and checking emails. Easy to setup out of the box Very simple to use, the keyboard comes on and off easily. Was completely changed when it came in. Would recommend this to anyone as a gift or for personal use if they are looking for a tablet to play on.
customer_reviews.author: Que Sera Sera

customer_reviews.title: It drops app and goes to that Galileo Pro faded slow flashing page.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son. His Viking Pro tablet broke so I replaced it with the Galileo Pro. The reviews for the Galileo Pro were great. unfortunately he complains that his apps are always closing when he is using them. It constantly takes him to the page that says Galileo Pro and he has to press the power button for about 10 seconds for it to function.. Also the apps constantly freezes. There are times when it is fine though, hence the 3 stars. Any suggestions on how to get this tablet working to its optimum?
customer_reviews.author: DeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, mouse not responsive, can't find settings, too much effort
customer_reviews.text: I will give this to my nine year old grandson and get myself an ipad. I should have done that in the first place. No instructions, cant figure out how to release keyboard from tablet, mousepad does what it wants, can't figure out most of it, price is good but what good is it if I can't use it. If instructions were included things would have gone smoothly. I've owned 10 or 15 laptops and desktops (maybe more) over the years so I'm not totally computer illiterate.
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my niece, item is exactly what she wanted. The color blue is her favorite, battery life is spectacular, first day it lasted 10 hours and continues to do so before needing a charge. That is watching videos and searching on the web those entire 10 hours straight. Great price for the tablet, I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive tablet that works really good. Item arrived on time and in a very secure package.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Corbett

customer_reviews.title: This RCA Galileo tablet`s terrible..
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is made for beginners / kids. I thought it would be much better for the brand name. Everything is low end quality.. Screens very bad, You have to look directly in front of it. Screen will blur out if you don`t. Touchscreen doesn`t work some of the time.. I thought the keyboard would be regular size. it was not. Battery life was not good.. You get what you pay for.. I returned it .. No harm. I bought a hp laptop instead. I`m very happy with that brand..
customer_reviews.author: Allen J.

customer_reviews.title: this is the best. The quality over my last 11
customer_reviews.text: I have had three generations of RCA tablets, this is the best. The quality over my last 11.5 inch is outstanding. They even thought to have a cover over the keyboard so no crumbs can get in.The case is more durable. I have one complaint my last 11.5 inch had an 8 hour battery this one has a 6 hour battery. I work with English and Russian and have no problem running the apps I need, switching languages, memory for same documents or videos in both languages, and bypassing Goggle translate.
customer_reviews.author: Дино

customer_reviews.title: good for lite browsing only...
customer_reviews.text: Its just OK, if you are used to a high end more expensive computer don't buy this one unless ,like me I you just want something small to carry around and do e-mail and watch U-Tube... It's not very responsive and seems to crash every so often. But it was cheep and the battery l charge is good.....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unpleasant to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Surface with a defunct keyboard, as it was considerably cheaper than the Surface keyboard alone. Big mistake. The software is clunky, the screen resolution is poor and for its size, it's very heavy. Didn't use it long, so no idea of battery life Just goes to show you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AnnM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little, not so little device! It’s a lot bigger then my kindle that I’m used to. But it’s great for watching movies on or surfing the net. The attachable keyboard works great. I had also ordered a regular laptop to use at home. But after getting this device I cancelled my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa marie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: screen is a C+ at best, it is slow to respond
customer_reviews.text: screen is a C+ at best, it is slow to respond, larger memory helps, too heavy and not comfortable to hold. keyboard is hardly worth using - better to spend extra 50 to 100 more and get more - get warranty and prepare to be inconvenienced if you have it a full year - works well only for the first 6 months and no matter the clean and rebooting, it just doesn't get much better than when it came out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Tea&Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. My family really loves having this in the house. I bought this as a temporary tablet with a keyboard to take care of some business issues while I was waiting for my computer to come back after a restoration issue in my home. This product is outstanding and woukd recommend to anyone. You can have this act like a laptop or a tablet. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: brian ng

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, nice price!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's lightweight and fits in my (admittedly oversized) pocketbook. I use Microsoft Office on it, and the keyboard (now that I'm used to what it lacks) makes it easy to edit and create documents. The Kindle app runs well, and it's a pleasure to read from the good-sized screen. An unexpected bonus is how well it works with my favorite radio app Tunein. Its speaker is superior to my phone's. Not being able to add it to my phone's data plan hasn't been a problem for me -- I use my phone's hotspot when no wifi is available. And the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product for Price
customer_reviews.text: i got this product to use for school. The keyboard is small and has very small keys. I could not type well and just stopped using the keyboard altogether. Now that I could not use it for school I just used it for playing music and my brother would play games on it. It is pretty much like an oversized tablet. After a year it stopped working. For the amount of money I paid I think it was an okay experience but I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, even for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This the worst tablet I have used. Constantly, needs to be charged. When typing, the cursor will just move to any spot on the doc. If using the keyboard, it's hard to get the screen to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk Can't Even Be Resold
customer_reviews.text: The tablet was lukewarm already: slow touchscreen response time, slow Google loading, etc. But if you get one and decide to resell it, DO NOT try to do a factory reset. Google has implemented a 'lock-out' program that won't let anyone log back in, including you. It'll just cycle you through the same annoying message. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: JazSewist

customer_reviews.title: Very slow and poor picture. Takes forever to come on and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Very slow and poor picture. Takes forever to come on and then it's very slow, reminds me of my first computer, a Commodore 64. Just about every app in Goggle Store warns may not be compatible with this device. However most do work with PayPal being the only exception I've found so far, can't use it at all. Wasn't expecting the world for what the cost was, but did expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott^S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 year old for his birthday a few months ago and works fantastic for him. We can stream Comcast, Netflix and he can play games in it. It's come in very handy since my laptop died recently. You have the ability to create several profiles. Mine has a lock on it and his I'm able to monitor and put lock on it how I see fit. Very glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: island_gal_904

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and painfully slow.
customer_reviews.text: Please Please don't waste your money. Screen is grainy and feels rough to the touch. I couldn't even update the apps that came pre installed on the device as I kept running into not enough memory error even though it was brand new. Was a huge headache and a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Powered on one time, and wouldn't power on again.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this - I was excited to receive it but after setting it up I left for a few hours and returned to find it completely dead. Charged it overnight in the hope that maybe the battery was just drained but in the morning it was still just as dead. Reached out to customer support and they advised to return for refund. I will, but I was hoping to have it to take on vacation. Will probably not buy again. (Keyboard is not as pictured)
customer_reviews.author: HeyitsTaryn

customer_reviews.title: Rca Viking is better
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned an RCA tablet for 2 years ?& haf been quite happy with it. So I didn't think twice about purchasing a 2nd RCA mofel that was meant to be a better model. Thid particular one was not. I only need it for writing & email so I didn't need any bells ?& whistles. No complaints about the seller. The seller was awesome. Side note- RCA GIVES GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this at home and taking my other one everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Im not mad at it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my mother in law, works great. A bit slow but its fits the price!
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Ok computer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift so i'm not able to Review properly. Its seems to be a good item for an 11yr old. I like the fact the keyboard disconnects and the system is lightweight. I'll come back to review. 3/30/19 Update Computer doesn't turn off sometimes, just gives a blue screen. I have requested a return/refund. 😞
customer_reviews.author: c neal

customer_reviews.title: Pefect tablet for beginners or as a secondary device.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I use a desktop pc, which makes it difficult when traveling or when I want to read in bed. It runs web pages and apps with no problem. The sound quality is much better than I could have expected. The screen color is sharp and responds without any lag. The battery lasts about 4 hours when reading and listening to Pandora. The only down side is the camera is crud - but I didn't buy it for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Menner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be returning this tablet. Any applications I've installed take a long time to open if they even do open and then once they are the crash before I can do anything with them. Basically the tablet is useless and has no functionality to it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop for starters
customer_reviews.text: It a good laptop,,It takes 25 seconds to fully boot up,,But the ram is to low, it takes some apps to load slow, and the battery drains fast, especially when i am using the WiFi,, If you are an immediate user or an advance user, this is not the lap top for you,,only for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it works great. The only drawback, is my keypad keeps falling off. I had to tape it on with Gorilla tape. It's very annoying. But other then that it's a sweet little laptop, tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rideout

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The resolution is very poor I wish I never wasted my money on this product I used it once and resolution was so poor I put it back in box I should have returned it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beyond perfect for our 9 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my 8 yr old. Easily instal family link to have complete parental control. The tablet feature is so convenient but the keyboard attachment is also needed at times.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Lauer

customer_reviews.title: wrong item description
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this tablet because it showed on the picture that it has hdmi port but when i got it and i ordered 2 of them neither of them had it.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Pe'er

customer_reviews.title: works good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good starter 2in1 laptop for kids or someone that scroll around on the internet. My son loves it and does jis school work on it and plays games and watches YouTube on it. It is a little bulky and heavy and the screen res isnt great but it does the job and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Is a very budget tablet, it is large but the quality of the screen isn't. Mine is blue and the screen turns blueish a lot, and the definition is not good. I was trying it out for sheet music and doesn't do the job, will keep my alcatel pixi 10 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Music

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better then I expected. Totally happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Had this tablet about 24 hrs now & really like it. I need to create some files on the desktop & load data into them & having nothing but trouble finding assistance to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Canard_Av8r

customer_reviews.title: Screen resolution
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and big but the screen sharpness is horrible... like a projection screen. I play games on it but videos. Tv, movies i watch on the smaller RCA. Better quality in picture. Drawback is it gets really hot after an hour of useage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Locke

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: It went out after a month of using it .. my son barely plays with it because he has a ps4 .. I’m sad for him because this was for him to have at his grannie house to keep him occupied ... I am thankful amazon provided a full refund so I will order him another one.. maybe he just got a bad one
customer_reviews.author: shavala hayes

customer_reviews.title: kept freezing up and was way to slow, even ...
customer_reviews.text: kept freezing up and was way to slow, even for what it was. only way to unfreeze it was to dump all memory and storage and reset it completely. it was sent back
customer_reviews.author: Mark Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: Hi so the Mouse is too fast and I don’t know how to slow it down the keyboard on the left-hand side where the mouse in the keys or looks a little damage but other Then that everything works it’s just the mouse is too fast
customer_reviews.author: Alysia shultz

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It won't stay on, I turn it on and less than 2min it goes off and I have to restart. It has nothing to do with display settings. It's even hard to turn on. Push the button once, nothing push button twice little more pressure still nothing. I'd say biggest issues is turning on and keeping on.
customer_reviews.author: Danger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible screen resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the screen resolution! Could not see anything unless in a dark room. And blurry. Guess could not expect much more for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: LUIZ A FRAZAO

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great for Prime movies and Netflix. but there seems to be lots of programs that are incompatible with the tablet and if you install them anyway; you will have to factory reset the thing.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it. It takes forever for it to pull up anything. Very slow. Will never purchase another one. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a tablet for reading mail and the news.Ocasionally when I have to write a lot I use the keybaord.I like Android O S but some apps require Windows which I don't like.Sometimes this is a problem and I must use another computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Kind of clunky though. And the screen resolution is not the best, but it's a great sturdy first computer for kids. Simple to us and parental settings are easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: vanmilio

customer_reviews.title: more tablet than laptop
customer_reviews.text: I'm just bummed that it acts more like a tablet than a laptop. But its great all around. The keyboard is a bit clunky and it misses or adds letters when you don't mean to, but eh, its little things.
customer_reviews.author: Steampunk-Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery performance
customer_reviews.text: I like the detachable keyboard and the full-size keys. The tablet is somewhat sluggish and the battery life is really poor even on the lowest resolution/ brightness. Standing before my audience I am scared that the tablet might shut down in the middle of my presentation. I've not used it since the first week in January because of low battery performance.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A.

customer_reviews.title: Decent overall
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price, but the screen is very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is TINY
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is not at pictured and VERY tiny. Didn't even bother turning it on, sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a little standby/backup when on the road. The wi-fi seems to work good and although a bit slow it seems to be a good value for the price. The sound quality isn't great but again for the price it's adequate for my needs. I haven't experienced any issues with it. The battery life isn't all that great but adequate for my needs. Overall I like it and am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome kids have Said that it is legging a lot of games and apps. Other than that works great it is durable and perfect for homework watching movies or videos
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 8 year old son for a Christmas gift. When I took it out the package so I could set it up I was amazed at how big the tablet was. He’s gonna love it. The camera and screen quality isn’t to good but it’s also not the worse thing. I paid a good price for a heavy duty laptop for my son. I fell in love with it while setting it up I know he’s gonna light up when he see it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Miller

customer_reviews.title: DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April arrive May 1st died by September and the warranty is only 60 days. My loss for you to learn DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Will not charge or hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: works very nicely..easy to set up..tablet or laptop..love the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use. Of course I'm not that technology gifted but am learning. Large screen and nice size keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Judy

customer_reviews.title: If you want it.
customer_reviews.text: It loads up slow but its good to have it u cant or dnt need a pc or laptop. I had this for two yrs and still use it. Its usefull if your online or playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Homeschooling my 3rd grader and this is exactly what we needed. No issues with google classroom and zoom chats. She finds it easy to use too. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer weaver

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look great but it works great
customer_reviews.text: The plastic makes the laptop look thicker than it should. It doesn’t come with excel or word but other than that, it’s great. Great for google drive users. You can download apps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Just bad, sorry I didn't return it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Just bad, sorry I didn't return it sooner. The product performed great for about 4months after that it would not stay on, it would boot up and go off. This is not a good product I should not give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect it to respond like an $800 tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this tablet for a month and it crashed. The video froze, then the audio went, and it would not reset with any method. I didn't expect it to respond like an $800 tablet, but you would think that it would have endured light use for a bit longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for this right now! Works as advertised! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for Netflix and Prime video
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done for the price. Keyboard hasn't been all that useful. Slow but if you're patient it works for downloading, streaming and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: KeithF

customer_reviews.title: I love the picture sharpness but because I use this tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture sharpness but because I use this tablet to watch my TV programs I didn't like how to select my shows sideways. My 10 inch. RCA tablet works perfectly while this 11 inch one constantly goes from using the keyboard to the screen keyboard which is highly annoying . Otherwise when my shows are playing the sound and picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn furbeck

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet it's more than what I was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet it's more than what I was expecting for the money everyone who sees it wants to order one
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Condon

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. Bought it for games because I previously had an amazon fire tablet which didn’t have much space for anything especially with all the amazon apps you can’t delete. Has tons of space, runs very fast, quality of picture is great and the speaker on this tablet it excellent. Love it so much totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Compact & fun
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for your buck. Grandchildren wanted one like mine & parents ordered them. Travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Stone-Black

customer_reviews.title: price was right
customer_reviews.text: i like the features such as USB and HDMI. its a bit slow but when compared to others it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Does what I wanted it to. East to transport. Wish it had a better camera. The quality isn’t good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet. I purchased this unit to use with my DJI Mavic Air drone. Absolutely no issues. Battery life is super with more than 7hrs use before a recharge is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight fast easy portable device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid and it’s perfect for a child I wouldn’t recommend it for an adult- limited capabilities storage and ram, processor speed is mediocre
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I gave this laptop as a gift for my neice. A gift. It started to fall apart. First just one key popped off. Then another... 5 so far...and counting! NEXT...the entire keyboard which snapped onto screen...permanently broke apart. Do not buy this product. She is so disappointed. Never again will I purchase from thisbseller
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Good starter comp
customer_reviews.text: Def would recommend this product. More so for the younger generation!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Battery life poor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a replacement for an older RCA 10 inch. Works OK, but battery life was supposed to be 6 hr., actual is less than 1.5 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Purchased two in December for my kids. Two months in and the battery dies instantly. From 100% to depleted in a matter of three minutes. Do not waste your money. Customer support is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: If I was not sick...stroke......I would send this ish back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great when i first got but 6 months ago or ...
customer_reviews.text: i have had mine for awhile just got around to doing rating. Was great when i first got but 6 months ago or more unable to turn power off if i dont keep plugged in will not work.
customer_reviews.author: tracy petralia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter tablet for kids. I got this for my 8 yr old for Christmas and it is still holding up and he loves it. He makes all of his YouTube videos on there.
customer_reviews.author: Lexis

customer_reviews.title: Good seller but outdated product
customer_reviews.text: Very good seller. Tablet itself way behind the competition. I would not buy it again although the large screen was nice. Screen is highly pixelated.
customer_reviews.author: Churchwarden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to do some work on. Perfect for his needs as a manager of a store. Makes schedules, does inventory, submits orders for items without any trouble. I'm able to use wifi with ease and keyboard attachment seems very durable. No issues with battery so far. Nice for the price and our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: My only concern is the short battery life and it would've been nice if it had more than 1gb of
customer_reviews.text: So far. It is working quite well. My only concern is the short battery life and it would've been nice if it had more than 1gb of ram
customer_reviews.author: suzanne rock

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.
customer_reviews.text: Had this about a week, so far its working well.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with instructions so I'm still trying to figure out how to use it
customer_reviews.author: MARGUERITE ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: I just love the product
customer_reviews.text: I so love this new tablet and I love the quality of the picture the sound my husband has to tell me to turn it down sometime but I really love this product it does me good
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harrell

customer_reviews.title: useless piece of product
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is not working at all. Super slow and can't even open up an app and play a video. Unfortunately can't return it due to time. No updates no support. Go put some extra money and buy something better. Don't recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Certainly good for the price - kids like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've bought (different kids). Good features, built pretty tough, and has all the Android apps available. Detachable keyboard is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: J Eads

product_meta.title: RCA Galileo 11.5" 32 GB Touchscreen Tablet Computer with Keyboard Case Quad-Core 1.3Ghz Processor 1GB Memory 32GB HDD Webcam Wifi Bluetooth Android 8.1 - Blue
product_meta.description: Introducing the RCA 11 Galileo Pro 2-in-1 tablet with detachable keyboard. The 11 Galileo Pro operates on Android Marshmallow and showcases the operating system’s brand-new material design. Captivate your eyes with the Galileo Pro’s amazingly clear, 11.5-inch high definition screen. The impressive 1.3GHz quad-core processor is powerful enough to zoom through applications and tasks. Quickly update your social statuses, compose emails and navigate the Web with the detachable keyboard and built-in trackpad. When it’s time to get down to business, open up the included WPS Office app and create powerful documents and spreadsheets. Effortlessly transition the RCA 11 Galileo Pro into a stand-alone tablet by detaching the keyboard. You may also dock the tablet to the keyboard in many positions to suit your liking or intended use. Use the tablet’s Bluetooth functionality to pair and connect with other Bluetooth-enabled devices.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE: Get the best of both worlds and use as either a tablet/computer or notebook by easily removing the keyboard.
SPEED: 1.3GHz 4 Quad-Core Processor. 1024×600 Touchscreen Display (11.5″). Battery life up to 6 hours.
BUILT-IN: 32GB Flash Storage Memory (MicroSD-expandable), Dual Front/Rear Camera, Full USB and Micro USB port, Bluetooth, and Rechargeable Battery.
FOR WORK OR PLAY: Stay efficient with Android OS 8.1 (Go Edition) and preinstalled apps available at the touch of your fingertips. Compatible with Google Play.
INCLUDES: Free travel keyboard and AC adapter. Ports/Jacks: Micro USB, Full USB, MicroSD card slot, 3.5mm Headphone jack, Microphone, DC jack.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars919 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
